data.title: Chandidas Mahavidyalaya News & Updates 2024
data.meta_description: Chandidas Mahavidyalaya News & Updates 2024 - Students can check here all the latest updates and news on Chandidas Mahavidyalaya. Also check notifications, exam notice board details and result release date news here.
data.text:
NCWEB College List 2024 include 26 undergraduate (UG) centers and one postgraduate (PG) center. Some of the NCWEB colleges in Delhi University are Aditi Mahavidyalaya, Aryabhatta College, Bhagini Nivedita College, Bharti College, College of Vocational Studies, Deen Dayal Upadhayay College, Dr. B.R. Ambedkar College, Hansraj College, J.D.M College, Jesus & Mary College, Kalindi College, Keshav Mahavidyalaya, Lakshmi Bai College, and so on.

The Non-Collegiate Women's Education Board (NCWEB) has announced that the DU NCWEB admissions process 2024 has begun. The NCWEB has released the official brochure for NCWEB admission 2024 and launched its website. On May 28, 2024, the DU NCWEB admission 2024 registration process began. Candidates can complete and submit their applications before they close. The admission dates for DU NCWEB 2024 will be announced shortly. Candidates can check here for additional important dates. Candidates must complete the DU NCWEB registration process 2024 by following the direct link provided here in the meantime.

Direct Link to DU NCWEB Registration Process 2024 (Activated)

The Non-Collegiate Women’s Education Board (NCWEB) was established in 1943 under the Delhi University Act. Under NCWEB, girl students have an option to study undergraduate and postgraduate courses at the designated NCWEB Teaching Centres that have been approved by Delhi University. NCWEB colleges of Delhi University hold special coaching classes on weekends or academic breaks and are not required to attend regular classes. There are a total of 26 NCWEB Colleges in Delhi University that conduct courses for women that not only provide infrastructure for education but also have library access where the students can invest more time in learning and reading. NCWEB colleges in Delhi University are open to female candidates who reside in the National Capital Territory of Delhi.

NCWEB colleges in Delhi University follows a unique study pattern as the classes take place on Sundays, leaving students with six working days to follow their dreams and study side by side. Girl candidates who find themselves unable to attend regular classes in DU can seek admission to DU NCWEB courses. In this age where DU cut-offs soar as high as 100%, DU NCWEB colleges are a great option for girl students who wish to pursue their educational dreams.

Read on to know more about List of NCWEB Colleges of Delhi University in detail!

List of MA English Colleges Accepting Odisha CPET 2024 Score includes Fakir Mohan University, Berhampur University, Ravenshaw University, Rama Devi Women’s University, Utkal University, North Orissa University, North Orissa University, Gangadhar Meher University, Sambalpur University, Rural Institute of Higher Studies, Panchayat Degree College, Bhadrak College Rajendra College, Banki College, Shailabala Women's Autonomous College etc.

Direct Link: Odisha CPET 2024 Merit List (Activated)

There are 24 colleges in the state of Odisha that offer admission into the MA English programme based on the Odisha CPET exam score. The Odisha CPET 2024 English exam was held between July 03, 2024 to July 14, 2024. The Odisha CPET 2024 results has been released on August 05, 2024 in the form of merit list. The merit list for the CPET 2024 is published by the Department of Higher Education in Odisha . The Subject-Wise and State-Wise Merit Lists is released on August 5, 2024, as per the official schedule. The official website, pg.samsodisha.gov.in, has hosted the merit list for the Odisha CPET 2024. Those who took the entrance exam can check the merit list above. On August 6, 2024, the counselling process for CPET 2024 will start. Qualified candidates fill out their choices for entrance to start the counselling process. August 12, 2024, is the deadline for finishing the choice-filling procedure.

Candidates who take the Odisha CPET exam with the aim of securing a seat in one of these MA English colleges must go through this article very carefully!

List of MA History Colleges Accepting Odisha CPET Score 2024 include Fakir Mohan University, Berhampur University, Ravenshaw University, Utkal University, Gangadhar Meher University, Sambalpur University, Panchayat Degree College, Bargarh Bhadrak (Autonomous) College, Rajendra (Autonomous) College, Balangir Shailabala Women's Autonomous College, Udaya Nath College of Science & Technology, Dhenkanal (Autonomous) College, Government Science College, Chhatrapur Khallikote (Autonomous) College, etc.

Direct Link: Odisha CPET 2024 Merit List (Activated)

There are various other colleges in the state of Odisha that offer admission into the MA History programme based on the Odisha CPET exam score. The Odisha CPET 2024 History exam was conducted from July 3 - July 14, 2024. The Odisha CPET 2024 results has been released on August 5, 2024. The result of CPET 2024 has been released in the form of merit list. The Subject-Wise and State-Wise Merit Lists is out on August 5, 2024. The Odisha CPET 2024 merit list is available on the official website, pg.samsodisha.gov.in. Candidates who took the entrance exam can view the Odisha CPET 2024 results by looking through the merit list. The counselling process for CPET 2024 will begin on August 6, 2024. To begin the counselling process, qualified candidates select their preferred entry. Moreover, the last date to complete the choice-filling is August 12, 2024.

Odisha Common PG Entrance Test is a state-level exam conducted to offer admission in different postgraduate courses across the state. The merit list for CPET MA History will be made available by the conducting body then the counselling process for admission will take place. Candidates featured in the merit list will be eligible to fill college options for MA History from the list of participating colleges. On this page, the candidates can check the list of Odisha CPET 2024 participating colleges for M.A. History along with seat matrix details. This will help the participants of counselling to choose the best college as per his/ her requirements.

The candidates who appear for MA History can check the list of colleges that accept Odisha CPET score in this article!
